duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and maintain rapport with key store individuals to provide outstanding customer service and maximize sales.
Conduct effective planning & order-writing while supporting and completing activities such as merchandising displays.
Participate in instore visits, ensuring leading brands are well represented, stocked, and maintained.
Negotiate with store managers, communicate any issues, and work closely with sales representative to optimize product visibility.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Work with Merchandisers to ensure inventory is fully stocked, rotated, and presentable at all times.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required. College degree preferred.
